message: Let's start with a generous offer. Accept and we can finish the game early!
You were too generous in the first round, I'll take the majority this time
You're being a bit greedy, Bob! I'm not giving up that much.
You're not getting it all, Bob. Meet me in the middle!
You're getting closer to the middle, but I'm still not willing to meet you there
You're not getting away that easily, Bob! I'll try to push you even harder.
You're running out of time, Bob. Meet me at the 55/45 split!
You're getting desperate, Alice, but I'm not going to back down
You think I'm desperate? I'm just getting started, Bob!
It's time to meet in the middle, Bob. 50/50 split, no more games!
